task.title: To Create and Configure the On Call Contacts
task.shortdesc: This topic explains how to create and configure the OnCallContacts based on priority. It represents a pairing between the user and a contact. The user must adequately configure the contact method. When an alarm is raised in the station based on the configuration, contacts the particular user and the user receives a notification via email or sms.

prereq.p: The user must be an existing user configured in the UserService.
The AlarmRecipient for the desired contact method should be configured in the AlarmService.

step.cmd: To create a new OnCallContacts, do one of the following.

choices.choice: In the Nav tree, expand OnCallService, right-click on any one of the OnCallLists and choose ViewsOn Call Contact Manager .
In the On Call List Manager view, double-click any one of the OnCallList.

step.stepresult: The On Call Contact Manager view opens.

step.cmd: To create a new OnCallContact, click New.
In the New window, configure the following parameters and click OK.

substep.cmd: Priority enter the desired priority level.
User select the user from the drop-down list that has a configured contact method (email id or sms).
User Alarm Recepient select the contact method (EmailRecepient or SMSRecepient) based on the user configuration.

step.stepresult: Creates a new OnCallContact with the desired contact method in the On Call Contact Manager view.
